subject: Re:Hearing Your Name Called Outloud.
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
I would love to hear some of your communication, i'm interested in 
seeing what you've been getting.  If you have a plan to bring this to 
the next level, i would love to hear how to go about it.  I'm still 
learning everyday and it seems that you know what you're talking 
about.  You must have had some good experiences in this, could you 
share with us what they are?

Thanx,
-Steve H.


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Nathan Sharman <v1230mail@...> wrote:
>
> Hi read books by Robert Monroe.
> 
> He had the ability to travel out of the body and go to
> the Astral.
> 
> There are Technologically advanced Aliens that seem to
> control the political situation in the Astral planes,
> and they do not want Earth humans to develop full
> communication with human spirits in the Astral.
> 
> WE HUMANS ARE BEING EXPLOITED IN THE ASTRAL PLANES,
> that is why when communications are going good, all of
> a sudden you no longer hear from the spirit any more,
> THAT IS BECAUSE THE SPIRIT WAS FORBIDDEN to
> communicate further.
> 
> WE NEED TO START DOING SERIOUS RESEARCH AND NOT GET
> ALL EXCITED TO JUST HEAR VOICES.
> 
> WE also need to study the physics involved, this is
> high energy physics.
> 
> __________________________________________________
> Do You Yahoo!?
